h2.a: Week 7 Food Box & Educational Packets Distribution

article.h3: Parent Letter regarding Continuous Learning Plan for 2020
article.p: The International Academy of Flint, College Preparatory Classes & Tuition Free Public Charter School, is a highly regarded public charter school and institution that provides tuition free, high-quality education to a diverse population in the Flint, MI area. IAF strives to help all students to achieve their full potential, prepare them for success in college, equip them with the ability and desire for lifelong learning, and strengthen their civic, ethical, and moral values. The tuition free public charter school houses elementary school, middle school and high school students, and maintains high standards of efficiency and accountability throughout its operation. Read the full letter here.
